amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for the Transportation Department by $3 million in order to eliminate funds provided to perform certain ICC rail and motor carrier functions after the ICC is terminated.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 20, as amendment No. 16, that decreases by $3 million the amount provided to the Transportation Department to carry out certain functions of the Interstate Commerce Commission, once the commission is terminated.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 270 (Roll no. 562).
